thread.title: Paris Saint-Germain confirm interest in Manchester United target Goncalo Guedes
thread.title_full: Paris Saint-Germain confirm interest in Manchester United target Goncalo Guedes

author: Alex Richards
title: Paris Saint-Germain confirm interest in Manchester United target Goncalo Guedes
text:
Guedes has impressed this season (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Paris Saint-Germain coach Unai Emery has confirmed the French champions are interested in a move for Benfica forward Goncalo Guedes. 
Guedes, 20, has been linked with a move to Manchester United, having been extensively watched by the Red Devils during the past six months. 
Now Spanish boss Emery has admitted that he is interested in taking the youngster to the Parc des Princes. 
"All good players are of interest to PSG and Guedes is one," Emery said ahead of PSG's Coupe de la Ligue semi-final away to Bordeaux. 
"We are working on him and one we have the opportunity to sign. 
"He is a good player, capable of playing wide or in the middle. He is a player of the future who is going to grow a lot." Guedes has been on the rise at Benfica (Photo: AFP) 
Guedes, who is represented by Jorge Mendes, is seen as one of the most highly-rated prospects in Portuguese football right now. 
And after committing his future to Benfica during the summer for this season, Guedes has been thrust front and centre in a new-look side. 
Rather than playing out wide, Guedes has been lining up in a central role for much of the season, under coach Rui Vitoria, responding with seven goals and seven assists in 28 games. 
However, speculation surrounding a move this month has ramped up in recent days, with Record stating that he was left out of the squad for the 4-0 win over Tondela at the weekend, due to negotiations over a potential exit from the Stadium of Light. poll loading Who will win Ligue 1? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
